title: Athelete of the Week: Brad Monroe, Greene Central, football
text: Posted Oct. 20, 2015 at 9:59 PM Updated at 10:01 PM Posted Oct. 20, 2015 at 9:59 PM Updated at 10:01 PM Monroe had only three receptions against North Lenoir, but made the most of them with 117 yards and three touchdowns. Monroeâ€™s first-half scores from 27, 45 and 45 yards helped propel the Rams to a 52-6 victory over the Hawks last week. The Free Press Posted Oct. 20, 2015 at 9:59 PM Updated at 10:01 PM
